text:
@10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson @UniofOxford It's a treatment which reduces the impact of those who have got Covid-19. It doesn't prevent people getting Covid-19

It would have been better to have got a grip to prevent the spread. 
Made sure people didn't go driving to test their eyes.
Made testing and tracing were in place
